function_description: Change language preference in 4ga Boards application.
initial_state: User is on the Preferences settings page of the 4ga Boards application with the current language set to English.
steps: Locate the 'Language' section on the Preferences settings page.
Click on the dropdown menu next to the 'Language' label.
Select the desired language from the dropdown options.
expected_state: The language preference of the 4ga Boards application is updated to the selected language, reflecting immediately in the user interface.
